ygData.subject: Re: Looking for a little advice for the low 20s
ygData.msgSnippet: ... That was just an extremely ugly pull.  Basically I went down fighting, back to back with a similar level ranger.  I finally died to two giant wooly spiders
ygData.messageBody:
> it except stop singing altogether (and even that didn't stop the
> two Ice Giants, eh, Harmonic?),

That was just an extremely ugly pull. Basically I went down
fighting, back to back with a similar level ranger. I finally
died to two giant wooly spiders and an ice giant. I don't even
remember if we killed the priest or not. But you seemed to
attract you fair attention of one particular ice giant that
was chasing you around as I recall ;)

Harmonic, the days of testing how tough perma ice giants were.
